text: Robert Candrea (born 3 February 1995) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Liga II side Dunărea Călărași.Două noi achiziții pentru Dunărea Călărași. Ambii jucători au debutat în meciul pierdut cu ”FC U” Craiova. liga2.prosport.ro On 19 January 2018, he signed a contract with Olimpia Grudziądz, which expired at 1 July 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:ASA 2013 Târgu Mureș players Category:SCM Gloria Buzău players Category:FC Dunărea Călărași players Category:I liga players Category:Olimpia Grudziądz players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland
title: Robert Candrea
